verses.kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
verses.ct: God, you are my God — I search for you with everything I have. My soul thirsts for you; my body aches for you like someone stranded in a parched, waterless wasteland.

verses.kjv: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
verses.ct: I long to see your power and your glory, just as I once witnessed them in the sanctuary.

verses.kjv: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
verses.ct: Your faithful love is worth more than life itself, so my lips will praise you.

verses.kjv: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
verses.ct: I will honor you as long as I live; I will raise my hands in worship of your name.

verses.kjv: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
verses.ct: My soul will be satisfied like someone enjoying the richest feast, and my mouth will celebrate you with joyful lips —

verses.kjv: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
verses.ct: whenever I think about you while lying in bed, reflecting on you through the hours of the night.

verses.kjv: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
verses.ct: Because you have been my help, I will sing with joy in the shelter of your wings.

verses.kjv: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
verses.ct: My soul clings tightly to you; your right hand holds me up.

verses.kjv: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
verses.ct: But those who are trying to destroy my life will sink down into the depths of the earth.

verses.kjv: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
verses.ct: They will be cut down by the sword; their bodies will become food for jackals.

verses.kjv: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
verses.ct: But the king will celebrate in God; everyone who makes promises by his name will be honored, while the mouths of liars will be silenced.
